description:
They have been together for a year and a half. They told us during their audition they have always been really turned on to the thought of performing for camera.

Well, they don't disappoint. You can see the lust in their eyes. The way they get on top of each other, kissing and stroking. You know they love making each other squirm with pleasure. They hump each other good in this one.

The scene concludes with Marco taking a load on his chest from his buddy and himself.
title: Jason Oxford & Marco
